extension.news: [COLOR lavender][B]Manage Kodi Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]2.0:[/B] - Inital Public release - Add ability to add Prefixes, Suffixes and Colors.
extension.description:
Lets you manage the entries in your [B]Favourites[/B] by either inserting/swapping entries and/or adding a "prefix/suffix" with "coloring".
This Kodi Program Addon allows you to graphically manage your Kodi favourites by inserting or swapping items and/or adding a prefix, suffix and color to you Kodi favourites Select item "A" and modify the Prefix/Suffix and Colors or slect "A" then "B" and move depending on the Insert/Swap mode.
Customize the actions in the configuration panel.
Use this to quickly and easily manage your Favourites.
